source.sqlReaderQuery:
Select
[Code],
[Description],
[Type],
[Category],
[Route category],
[Route Street category],
'10001' as Site_Code
FROM [dbo].[BIPL - ANDHRA PRADESH$Bisleri Common master]
WHERE [Code Type]=30
UNION ALL

[Code],
[Description],
[Type],
